name: A 1 DAY ROMANCE WITH A CRAB 🦀
name_original: A 1 DAY ROMANCE WITH A CRAB 🦀
description:
A 1 DAY ROMANCE (WITH A CRAB 🦀) You manage to save a gorgeous crab from certain death. Do you have what it takes to conquer his heart? Dive in into this beautiful, exciting romance story featuring the most famous crustacean in the world! "This is the best game I've ever played!" -Elon Musk "Original, inspiring; a journey full of emotion and crabs. Made me cry a little, but don't put that in the review page!" -Obama "I wish this game was my son" -Your mom What are you waiting for?? Your crabby-darling is awaiting for his rescue!

Artist / Professional Sh*tposter: 
Nao / @krepen / https://krepen.itch.io/

Programmer / Cursed Meme Provider: 
Rusty https://rus7y.itch.io/

Game designer / Main scriptwriter / Furry uwu: 
Kevin https://yameharte.itch.io/

This game was made for the Women Game Jam 2021.
https://itch.io/jam/women-game-jam-2021
